attributes.action: Stop labour from cutting pip to disabled people.
attributes.additional_details: Don’t cut pip payments and stop sending billions to other countries instead
attributes.background: This will make it impossible for disabled people to survive and believe many lives will be lost by the distress it is going to cause

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918

Protect Disabled people who cannot work from planned cuts to benefits
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721547
